data.title: Girl's Day Profile
data.meta_description: Girl’s Day is a four member girl group under Dream Tea Entertainment. They officially made their debut in 2010 as five girls with their first MV “Tilt My Head”. A couple of days later they released their debut mini album, “Girl’s Day Party 1”. Jihae left the group in October 2012, she replaced Jisun who…
data.text:
Girl’s Day is a four member girl group under Dream Tea Entertainment. They officially made their debut in 2010 as five girls with their first MV “Tilt My Head”. A couple of days later they released their debut mini album, “Girl’s Day Party 1”.

Jihae left the group in October 2012, she replaced Jisun who left the group in September 2010.

Sojin (Group leader)

Real name: Park So-jin (박소진)

Date of birth: May 21st, 1986

Height: 167cm

Weight: 47Kg

Blood type: AB

Hobbies: Cleaning, searching for a good song, writing music, browsing youtube video, Shopping, eating snacks and playing piano

Skills: Piano and Calligraphy

Twitter: @girls_day_Sojin

Jihae (Ex)

Real name: Woo Ji-hae (우지해)

Date of birth: May 14th, 1989

Height: 163cm

Weight: 43Kg

Blood type: B

Hobbies: Music appreciation, Shopping, Exercise (Gym) and Yoga

Skills: Korean Dance, Modern Dance, Ballet and Hiking/Climbing

Jihae departed from Girls Day in October 2012. Dream Tea Entertainment made a statement regarding her departure, “Reason behind Jihae’s leave is personal and something that has been deliberated on for a long time. Part of it includes wanting to concentrate on her studies (Jihae is majoring in dance at Sungkyunkwan University)… On Jihae’s future, Jihae and the agency will be discussing various options.”

Yura

Real name: Kim Ah-young (김아영)

Name: 유라 (Yura)

Date of birth: November 6th, 1992

Height: 168cm

Weight: 49Kg

Blood type: O

Hobbies: Painting, Dancing & Listening to the music

Twitter: @Girls_Day_Yura

Hyeri

Real name: Lee Hye-ri (이혜리)

Date of birth: June 9th, 1994

Height: 166cm

Weight: 46Kg

Blood type: AB

Hobbies: Watching movies and reading a book

Group maknae

Twitter :@Girls_Day_Hyeri

Minah
